attributes.action: Recover cost of Libya military action from frozen Libyan assets
attributes.additional_details: The Libyan National Transitional Council is today asking for assets frozen by countries of Allied Forces to be released to fund re-building of Libya. I propose that the costs of our military action in support of the Libyan people are recovered through sale of assets known to be owned by supporters of Gaddafi. For example a rather nice "Saif" house in Hampstead, North London would generate £5m easily.
